NULL: Some input data, or maybe the output pointer, was null.
FAILED: The crypto lib was unable to derive a key from the given passphrase,

NULL: Some input data, or maybe the output pointer, was null.
INVALID_LENGTH: The input data was shorter than {@link ToxCryptoConstants.ENCRYPTION_EXTRA_LENGTH} bytes.
BAD_FORMAT: The input data is missing the magic number (i.e. wasn't created by this
KEY_DERIVATION_FAILED: The crypto lib was unable to derive a key from the given passphrase,
which is usually a lack of memory issue. The functions accepting keys
FAILED: The encrypted byte array could not be decrypted. Either the data was
corrupt or the password/key was incorrect.
